articles.description: Tim and Diane Ledvina's posthumous donation of $4.8 million to Liverpool's Queens General Hospital Foundation is the largest-single private donation the foundation has ever received.
articles.content:
An American couple who found peace in a small, seaside Nova Scotia town will continue serving the community for years to come.
